main event: A military witness observed a bright, sparkling star-like object with a double exhaust or tail that disappeared upward into the clouds.
interesting points: The object was described as a white, sparkling star-like object, possibly 3-4 inches in diameter.
The object had a double exhaust or tail and was moving in all upward directions.
The sighting lasted for 5 to 10 minutes.
The report was verified as a balloon for an international flight.
The Air Force requested more information about the sighting, such as the elevation, azimuth, and the description from the witness's friend who also saw the object.
sighted object: A bright, sparkling star-like object with a double exhaust or tail
